sentence.Network_en: The phone jangled its two longs, one short for Drogheda.
sentence.Network_cn: 电话铃响了二次长音, 一次短音,是打给德洛耶达的.

sentence.Network_en: Drogheda's profits soared out of all imagination.
sentence.Network_cn: 德罗达的利润正在以难以想象的速度直线上升.

sentence.Network_en: The road to Drogheda brought back no memories of his youth.
sentence.Network_cn: 通往德洛耶达的道路引不起他对青年时代的回忆.

means.word_mean: 1. in 1649 the place was captured by Oliver Cromwell, who massacred the Catholic inhabitants

auth_sentence.content: His first target was the town of Drogheda north of Dublin which he stormed and captured.
auth_sentence.res_content: His first target was the town of Drogheda north of Dublin which he stormed and captured.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His first target was the town of Drogheda north of Dublin which he stormed and captured.
